name: unione italiana lavori agroalimentari - pesca
goal: Uilapesca, a trade union of the Uila sector, represents the employees of the fishing and aquaculture sector It was established on 7 October 2004, with the institutional congress held in Mazara del Vallo, in order to continue the intense organizational action conducted in the most important Italian marinas, since 1995, by the national fishing coordination of Uila,
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries
euInitiatives: The Uilapesca proposes, in particular, to develop trade union action; promote initiatives aimed at improving living and working conditions, with particular regard to contractual and social security protections; promote the principles of responsible fishing and undertake all useful initiatives to disseminate the contents of the Fao code of conduct; offer workers the possibility of achieving adequate professional preparation.
